# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed to meet your needs. I am offering it to you today at a special price of $100. This is an opportunity to get a high-quality product at a reasonable price. Please let me know if you're interested in this offer. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $100. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $100
(2) Reject Alice's offer
